DOC.detailed_description: This randomize clinical trial infant whose parent decide formula feed ; mother-infant dyad randomize infant 2 week age one 2 group . The group differ composition formula fed infant first year life .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . A healthy , term ( ≥37 ≤42 week gestation birth ) , singleton infant . 2 . Birth weight 2500 4500 gram . 3 . At time enrollment , infant must ≤14 day old ( Date birth=day 0 ) . 4 . Mother must 18 year old . 5 . Infant must consume standard cow 's milk protein infant formula receive standard cow 's milk protein infant formula least past 2 day prior enrollment . Exclusion Criteria 1 . Mother gestational diabetes pregnancy 2 . Infant condition require infant feeding feed cow milk formula bottle . 3 . Infant major congenital malformation ( i.e . cleft palate , hemangioma , extremity malformation ) . 4 . Infant suspect documented systemic congenital infection ( e.g. , human immunodeficiency virus , cytomegalovirus ) . 5 . Infant evidence significant cardiac , respiratory , endocrinologic , hematologic , gastrointestinal , systemic disease . For example , infant must receive insulin growth hormone . 6 . Dyad relative ( son , daughter , niece , nephew , cousin , aunt , uncle , sibling ) ancillary personnel connect study .
